overview: Mr. Hernandez obtained a Bachelor of Science degree in Neuroscience and graduate degrees in Molecular Genetics and Business Administration from The University of Florida. He has been published in several highly-respected scientific journals and presented at numerous scientific meetings. He has held senior level marketing, sales and business development positions at Digene Corporation, Affymetrix, Inc., and Merck. Mr. Hernandez has successfully launched numerous products in the pharmaceutical, research and diagnostic markets. He has in-depth knowledge of market research, competitive analysis and business development.
